document_data.name: Morninglow Tower
document_data.owner:
[[Liam Sunmist|Lightlord Liam Sunmist]] (c. [[1366 DR]])
[[Luc Sunbright]] (c. [[1479 DR]])
document_data.mainbody: '''Morninglow Tower''' was a temple in [[Daggerford]] dedicated to [[Lathander]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and to [[Amaunator]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
document_data.Location: Morninglow Tower was located along [[Duke's Way]] overlooking the city's southern gate, also known as the [[Farmers' Gate]], not far from the [[Happy Cow]] inn.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Inhabitants:
The congregation was led by [[Liam Sunmist|Lightlord Liam Sunmist]] in the 1360s [[DR]].

As of [[1372 DR]], Liam still remained the head of the temple in Daggerford, but under the title of a Dawnbringer.

As of [[1479 DR]], the temple was under the care of [[Luc Sunbright]].
